body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, attorney. Person County, North Carolina native. Married to Nancy E. Cox Clayton. Father of William Clayton. Farmer and tobacco merchant. Served as deputy sheriff in 1859. Appointed United States enumerator in 1860. Served as County Clerk. Admitted to the bar in 1862. Elected county judge in 1866 and served one term.
